comment.author: 9003948@N05
comment._content: Its not actually a harbour here. This is Margate Beach.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: View in 2012: Street View The harbor with the lighthouse is in the background.The church which is also visible in the background, the Holy Trinity (Old) Church, was bombed in 1943. The remains were demolished in 1958. kent.lovesguide.com/margate_holy_trinity_old.htm
